localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: Champions on the battlefield, Tomb Princes serve to protect their kings whilst imbuing their battlefield units with experience and increasing public order in campaign.

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details.localised_choice_title: Champions on the battlefield, Tomb Princes serve to protect their kings whilst imbuing their battlefield units with experience and increasing public order in campaign.

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: Masters of stone and construction, Necrotects improve construct units’ performance in battle, whilst also granting greater mobility and improved income in campaign.

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details.localised_choice_title: Masters of stone and construction, Necrotects improve construct units’ performance in battle, whilst also granting greater mobility and improved income in campaign.

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: Powerful spellcasters in battle, Liche Priests replenish fallen warriors within their armies, cleanse the corruption left by other races in the campaign, and improve the rate at which you can research new dynasties.

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details.localised_choice_title: Powerful spellcasters in battle, Liche Priests replenish fallen warriors within their armies, cleanse the corruption left by other races in the campaign, and improve the rate at which you can research new dynasties.

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: The sand nourishes the dead until their time of arising. Our troops will be strengthened by the earth.

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details.localised_choice_title: The sand nourishes the dead until their time of arising. Our troops will be strengthened by the earth.

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: Like the desert wind, our riders will move fiercely and swiftly with the Faceless God at their shoulders.

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details.localised_choice_title: Like the desert wind, our riders will move fiercely and swiftly with the Faceless God at their shoulders.

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: To lose one of our most prestigious, most sacred temples is a risk too great to bear. We cannot risk its collapse - use everything to reinforce it and prevent that from occurring.

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details.localised_choice_title: To lose one of our most prestigious, most sacred temples is a risk too great to bear. We cannot risk its collapse - use everything to reinforce it and prevent that from occurring.

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: Pah! The cities of the Tomb Kings have stood for millennia and will continue to - so great is the power of their creators. Do nothing and no catastrophe shall befall us.

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details.localised_choice_title: Pah! The cities of the Tomb Kings have stood for millennia and will continue to - so great is the power of their creators. Do nothing and no catastrophe shall befall us.

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: In time, this whole world will turn to sand; first this river, then the oceans! At the end, our empire will continue to stand, unswerving and eternal.

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details.localised_choice_title: In time, this whole world will turn to sand; first this river, then the oceans! At the end, our empire will continue to stand, unswerving and eternal.

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: Tasking our slaves with changing the river's course could be the key to averting disaster, along with all the prayers and rites to the higher powers that we can muster!

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details.localised_choice_title: Tasking our slaves with changing the river's course could be the key to averting disaster, along with all the prayers and rites to the higher powers that we can muster!

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: Our many bound servants have been busied labouring for our greatness, but we can spare a small number to labour at our venerable Liche Priests' behest.

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details.localised_choice_title: Our many bound servants have been busied labouring for our greatness, but we can spare a small number to labour at our venerable Liche Priests' behest.

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: Without the tireless work of the Liche Priests, the Tomb Kings would not be properly preserved and adequately prepared for their glorious reawakenings. We must give the Mortuary Cult that which they ask, lest their great work be halted!

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details.localised_choice_title: Without the tireless work of the Liche Priests, the Tomb Kings would not be properly preserved and adequately prepared for their glorious reawakenings. We must give the Mortuary Cult that which they ask, lest their great work be halted!

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: Our focus should be on restoring those buildings which provide troops for our armies. Doing so will hasten the reconquest of our former territories.

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details.localised_choice_title: Our focus should be on restoring those buildings which provide troops for our armies. Doing so will hasten the reconquest of our former territories.

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: The greatest empires were launched from stable foundations. Improving the buildings that form our essential infrastructure will surely bring us closer to paradise?

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details.localised_choice_title: The greatest empires were launched from stable foundations. Improving the buildings that form our essential infrastructure will surely bring us closer to paradise?

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: One thousand years confined to his tomb, with maybe just a few scarabs and scorpions for company, should teach this treacherous cleric the error of his ways!

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details.localised_choice_title: One thousand years confined to his tomb, with maybe just a few scarabs and scorpions for company, should teach this treacherous cleric the error of his ways!

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: Let him talk, allow him his intrigue and scheming, for in the end everyone serves their Unliving liege, one way or another.

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details.localised_choice_title: Let him talk, allow him his intrigue and scheming, for in the end everyone serves their Unliving liege, one way or another.

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: There is secret knowledge to be found inside that chamber. We should continue our excavation to uncover it at once.

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details.localised_choice_title: There is secret knowledge to be found inside that chamber. We should continue our excavation to uncover it at once.

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: There are many other tombs to be explored here, whose rewards are just as fruitful and could be unearthed much more quickly.

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details.localised_choice_title: There are many other tombs to be explored here, whose rewards are just as fruitful and could be unearthed much more quickly.

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: These 'men' are not warriors - they are not even real men - and are therefore not worthy of our time and attention. Move on!

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details.localised_choice_title: These 'men' are not warriors - they are not even real men - and are therefore not worthy of our time and attention. Move on!

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: All must serve the Tomb Kings one way or another… Spare no expense: use the Lizardmen's flesh and blood to ensure those Tomb Kings yet to awaken do so stronger than ever before!

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details.localised_choice_title: All must serve the Tomb Kings one way or another… Spare no expense: use the Lizardmen's flesh and blood to ensure those Tomb Kings yet to awaken do so stronger than ever before!

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: Possibly, our labourers have not worked hard enough. A swelling of their numbers, and some encouragement with the lash, should better align their priorities with our own!

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details.localised_choice_title: Possibly, our labourers have not worked hard enough. A swelling of their numbers, and some encouragement with the lash, should better align their priorities with our own!

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: Reinforcing the contingent guarding the sinking tomb would show prudence - our troops will ensure that the pyramid remains above ground.

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details.localised_choice_title: Reinforcing the contingent guarding the sinking tomb would show prudence - our troops will ensure that the pyramid remains above ground.

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: It matters not what power controls the Necrosphinx, only that it obeys our orders and brings destruction to our enemies on command!

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details.localised_choice_title: It matters not what power controls the Necrosphinx, only that it obeys our orders and brings destruction to our enemies on command!

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: Usekph, you say? We cannot allow those gods shunned by our ancestors a new foothold on our sands - order the Necrosphinx back underground to be with its dusty patron!

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details.localised_choice_title: Usekph, you say? We cannot allow those gods shunned by our ancestors a new foothold on our sands - order the Necrosphinx back underground to be with its dusty patron!

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: We have slaves aplenty, and no need of living mouths which must be fed lest they cease to breathe. Let them wander but offer no help; they will most likely perish in the unforgiving sands.

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details.localised_choice_title: We have slaves aplenty, and no need of living mouths which must be fed lest they cease to breathe. Let them wander but offer no help; they will most likely perish in the unforgiving sands.

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: Any found wandering our lands are the property of the Tomb Kings! Really, it is a simple matter: they are in our lands so they belong to us. Put them to work digging, and don't spare the lash!

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details.localised_choice_title: Any found wandering our lands are the property of the Tomb Kings! Really, it is a simple matter: they are in our lands so they belong to us. Put them to work digging, and don't spare the lash!

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: Long ago, Alcadizaar fought to defeat a great evil from our lands. We should honour the loyalty of his troops by observing the correct funeral rites.

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details.localised_choice_title: Long ago, Alcadizaar fought to defeat a great evil from our lands. We should honour the loyalty of his troops by observing the correct funeral rites.

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: We can be certain that the Conqueror no longer requires his servants, at least not on this mortal plane. Let us use their desiccated bones in continuance of our quest for a worldly-paradise!

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details.localised_choice_title: We can be certain that the Conqueror no longer requires his servants, at least not on this mortal plane. Let us use their desiccated bones in continuance of our quest for a worldly-paradise!

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: A sister is a valuable sacrifice - well-known and well-loved; emotion brings power to proceedings! Bring her before the Witch Elves in chains! Her blood will win the favour of the Brides of Khaine, ensuring our future victories!

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details.localised_choice_title: A sister is a valuable sacrifice - well-known and well-loved; emotion brings power to proceedings! Bring her before the Witch Elves in chains! Her blood will win the favour of the Brides of Khaine, ensuring our future victories!

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: Sacrificing one's chief and favoured bodyguard will surely slake the Lord of Murder's great thirst. Bring the rest of the guard also - they too should participate and share in the blessing!

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details.localised_choice_title: Sacrificing one's chief and favoured bodyguard will surely slake the Lord of Murder's great thirst. Bring the rest of the guard also - they too should participate and share in the blessing!

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: These foul beasts cannot hope to hold in the face of our merciless charge! Ride them down! Slaughter them all!

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details.localised_choice_title: These foul beasts cannot hope to hold in the face of our merciless charge! Ride them down! Slaughter them all!

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: Such low, mindless creatures are undeserving of the honour of honest, Druchii warfare. From the safety of the forest, kill their leader; then watch the rest scatter.

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details.localised_choice_title: Such low, mindless creatures are undeserving of the honour of honest, Druchii warfare. From the safety of the forest, kill their leader; then watch the rest scatter.

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: For his treachery, this one and his pathetic rabble have forfeited the right to a warrior's death. Shoot every one, leave them for the carrion; let his miserable failure be the downfall of them all.

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details.localised_choice_title: For his treachery, this one and his pathetic rabble have forfeited the right to a warrior's death. Shoot every one, leave them for the carrion; let his miserable failure be the downfall of them all.

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: Their can be only one answer to abject treachery; gather your best men, disarm and execute the foe. Their deaths will be cruel beyond imagining; your men will revel in delight at the traitors' cries of torment. Few will dare speak of your brutality this day, but all will remember it.

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details.localised_choice_title: Their can be only one answer to abject treachery; gather your best men, disarm and execute the foe. Their deaths will be cruel beyond imagining; your men will revel in delight at the traitors' cries of torment. Few will dare speak of your brutality this day, but all will remember it.

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: The beast will bend to the lash - It will obey you! Such a breaking will command your troops' respect. The Beastmasters, too, will pay well for such a creature.

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details.localised_choice_title: The beast will bend to the lash - It will obey you! Such a breaking will command your troops' respect. The Beastmasters, too, will pay well for such a creature.

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: Before the Druchii, all are prey, as soon this beast will learn. Kill it, and let its fangs adorn the shields of your troops!

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details.localised_choice_title: Before the Druchii, all are prey, as soon this beast will learn. Kill it, and let its fangs adorn the shields of your troops!

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: Pride is powerful, but blinding. Do not let it obscure a tactical opportunity; fall back, regroup, and strike back with renewed vigour and rage!

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details.localised_choice_title: Pride is powerful, but blinding. Do not let it obscure a tactical opportunity; fall back, regroup, and strike back with renewed vigour and rage!

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: The Druchii do not retreat, do not relent! Form up - we will make them bleed until they cry for mercy that will never come!

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details.localised_choice_title: The Druchii do not retreat, do not relent! Form up - we will make them bleed until they cry for mercy that will never come!

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: Disembark out of sight and take them by surprise. Let the onslaught be silent, bloody and - above all - entirely without mercy!

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details.localised_choice_title: Disembark out of sight and take them by surprise. Let the onslaught be silent, bloody and - above all - entirely without mercy!

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: What do Druchii have to fear from fishermen and housewives? Nothing! Beach the ships, deploy the troops; this village will be under our control within the hour!

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details.localised_choice_title: What do Druchii have to fear from fishermen and housewives? Nothing! Beach the ships, deploy the troops; this village will be under our control within the hour!

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: Make them well aware that they have been observed and will surely be slaughtered should they raise their blades, then hope such boldness in the face of adversity will command fear and respect.

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details.localised_choice_title: Make them well aware that they have been observed and will surely be slaughtered should they raise their blades, then hope such boldness in the face of adversity will command fear and respect.

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: These vagrants will suffer, but not before a tactical retreat back to the main host. Naturally, the leader of your scouts will suffer greatly for his failure to do his duty!

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details.localised_choice_title: These vagrants will suffer, but not before a tactical retreat back to the main host. Naturally, the leader of your scouts will suffer greatly for his failure to do his duty!

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: This slaughter was surely a blessing from Khaine. We must pay our due to thank him for his bounty; a large tithe, at once, to the nearest temple!

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details.localised_choice_title: This slaughter was surely a blessing from Khaine. We must pay our due to thank him for his bounty; a large tithe, at once, to the nearest temple!

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: The spoils of this glorious slaughter are mine and mine alone! Anyone who tries to keep some for himself will suffer at my hand!

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details.localised_choice_title: The spoils of this glorious slaughter are mine and mine alone! Anyone who tries to keep some for himself will suffer at my hand!

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: We can slip in, unseen, through a small waterside entrance to the mansion. Let Mathlann be with us, as we pierce these defences unseen and in silence.

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details.localised_choice_title: We can slip in, unseen, through a small waterside entrance to the mansion. Let Mathlann be with us, as we pierce these defences unseen and in silence.

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: Let their final moments be ones of abject horror. Smash the doors apart, slaughter everyone, and string their corpses from the burning ruins!

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details.localised_choice_title: Let their final moments be ones of abject horror. Smash the doors apart, slaughter everyone, and string their corpses from the burning ruins!

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: Let the gemstone be set atop the tallest of our towers! All those who gaze upon it will bask in wealth and splendour and know that it is ours!

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details.localised_choice_title: Let the gemstone be set atop the tallest of our towers! All those who gaze upon it will bask in wealth and splendour and know that it is ours!

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: The stone clearly has magical properties, so should be kept close at all times. Wrap it in the finest of spider silk and carry it along. You never know when it might needed…

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details.localised_choice_title: The stone clearly has magical properties, so should be kept close at all times. Wrap it in the finest of spider silk and carry it along. You never know when it might needed…

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: Disperse them; separated and diluted, they can no longer be a threat. Should any attempt to rise up, brutally execute them, publicly. They will soon learn that their masters suffer no defiance!

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details.localised_choice_title: Disperse them; separated and diluted, they can no longer be a threat. Should any attempt to rise up, brutally execute them, publicly. They will soon learn that their masters suffer no defiance!

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: Press them into service with your army; if you're lucky, they may be the first to scale a wall or stand beneath burning pitch during the next siege…

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details.localised_choice_title: Press them into service with your army; if you're lucky, they may be the first to scale a wall or stand beneath burning pitch during the next siege…

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: Drag him back to the city, parade him for the crowds, hang the wretch with a short rope, then drag his corpse back through the streets as a deterrent. Let no slave think of rebellion as they gaze upon his mutilated, treacherous corpse!

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details.localised_choice_title: Drag him back to the city, parade him for the crowds, hang the wretch with a short rope, then drag his corpse back through the streets as a deterrent. Let no slave think of rebellion as they gaze upon his mutilated, treacherous corpse!

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: What he does not say now, he will soon. Whatever means are required, pull the information from between his tortured screams. Once he reveals the other slaves' location, you may continue the torture…

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details.localised_choice_title: What he does not say now, he will soon. Whatever means are required, pull the information from between his tortured screams. Once he reveals the other slaves' location, you may continue the torture…

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: This magical elixir makes the skin as tough as unyielding granite, and equally grey! They will tire long before you fail.

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details.localised_choice_title: This magical elixir makes the skin as tough as unyielding granite, and equally grey! They will tire long before you fail.

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: This potion will bolster your aggression in battle, giving rise to an irrepressible rage and lust for combat. Take them all on!

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details.localised_choice_title: This potion will bolster your aggression in battle, giving rise to an irrepressible rage and lust for combat. Take them all on!

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: Such a fearsome creature certainly has its uses; accept this deal and leave the Dragon be, for now.

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details.localised_choice_title: Such a fearsome creature certainly has its uses; accept this deal and leave the Dragon be, for now.

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: Dragons are not to be trusted - avarice and malice rule their savage hearts! And yet their heads make magnificent trophies. Slay the beast! Take its head!

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details.localised_choice_title: Dragons are not to be trusted - avarice and malice rule their savage hearts! And yet their heads make magnificent trophies. Slay the beast! Take its head!

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: Rinse the blade in corrosive poison - the merest of scratches will cripple the foe!

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details.localised_choice_title: Rinse the blade in corrosive poison - the merest of scratches will cripple the foe!

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: Weave the arcane blessings into the very steel of the blade - it will feed on the screams of its victims!

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details.localised_choice_title: Weave the arcane blessings into the very steel of the blade - it will feed on the screams of its victims!

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: The foe will know nothing but spite and contempt! Oh, and death of course - they will know sweet death, soon enough…

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details.localised_choice_title: The foe will know nothing but spite and contempt! Oh, and death of course - they will know sweet death, soon enough…

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: The assault of wrath and rage will be legendary, even among the gods; nothing will stand against it and live!

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details.localised_choice_title: The assault of wrath and rage will be legendary, even among the gods; nothing will stand against it and live!

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: Khaine may take terrifying form in the aspect of the Banshee; all foes will know despair before it!

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details.localised_choice_title: Khaine may take terrifying form in the aspect of the Banshee; all foes will know despair before it!

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: Death will pay for life; in times of need, this one's normally-worthless blood will be spared.

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details.localised_choice_title: Death will pay for life; in times of need, this one's normally-worthless blood will be spared.

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: The Hydra's legendary conflagrating breath is drawn from the bile it produces. Now extracted, that power is yours!

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details.localised_choice_title: The Hydra's legendary conflagrating breath is drawn from the bile it produces. Now extracted, that power is yours!

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: The Hydra is one of few creatures able to recover from the most grievous of wounds. The key to this regeneration must come from the slain beast's blood, surely?

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details.localised_choice_title: The Hydra is one of few creatures able to recover from the most grievous of wounds. The key to this regeneration must come from the slain beast's blood, surely?

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: A haul of high quality weapons and armour for the battlefield.

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details.localised_choice_title: A haul of high quality weapons and armour for the battlefield.

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: In the captain's chest are rare maps to reveal the way and unspoilt rations to feed the warriors.

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details.localised_choice_title: In the captain's chest are rare maps to reveal the way and unspoilt rations to feed the warriors.

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: Recovered from the wreck - fine blades and armour for the battlefield.

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details.localised_choice_title: Recovered from the wreck - fine blades and armour for the battlefield.

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: Yo-ho-ho and a barrel of… such a restorative will keep your armies merry and healthy, and have the crew throwing caution to the wind to explore the map.

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: Malekith favours honest dealings above treachery! Leave the shadowy spymaster to his whispers - they are all he knows.

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: Have Ezresor's little informants killed; let him know the price of interference!

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: That which brings Malekith closer to his darkest desires is a thing worth doing. He can have the accursed egg if it makes him happy!

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: The egg's strength is rightfully yours. Claim it, and achieve a power beyond all other!

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details.localised_choice_title: The egg's strength is rightfully yours. Claim it, and achieve a power beyond all other!

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: The strength of Khaine shall be ours. One must always be prepared to spill blood in return for power!

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details.localised_choice_title: The strength of Khaine shall be ours. One must always be prepared to spill blood in return for power!

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: This army marches on its own strength, not that of some 'god'. There will be no sacrifice today.

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details.localised_choice_title: This army marches on its own strength, not that of some 'god'. There will be no sacrifice today.

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: By whispering the most propitious thing into the ear most inclined to hear it, you indirectly inform the Witch King of just who was responsible for saving his face this day…

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details.localised_choice_title: By whispering the most propitious thing into the ear most inclined to hear it, you indirectly inform the Witch King of just who was responsible for saving his face this day…

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: Why let Malekith reap a reward he does not deserve? Especially when there is a fortune to be gained!

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: With the right Dreadlord in command, Hag Graef could be of immense help to our cause. We will do what we can to advance our chosen candidate.

localised_choice_label.last_approved_text: Leave them to their power struggle

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: The petty squabbles of would-be tyrants are not our concern. This is another fight for a different time.

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: The weak deserve nothing but death! See it done!

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: Power, once offered, should never be denied. NEVER!

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: If Malekith truly fears these conjurers, then he will pay handsomely for this one's miserable life. The strong survive; the weak are destroyed. This one is weak.

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: Let the Witch King fret for his safety and find this Sorcerer another time. There is power to be had and, by the gods, you shall have it!

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: If one can kill judiciously and on command, he need not undergo any stricture to his person.

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: The Underworld Sea is treacherous; no one should attempt to tame it unaided.

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: If they cannot stand on their own two feet and be strong, then they deserve to fail. No, they shall not have our aid.

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details.localised_choice_title: If they cannot stand on their own two feet and be strong, then they deserve to fail. No, they shall not have our aid.

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: The Hags cannot be stopped. You may as well offer them something now, rather than have it taken from you later.

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details.localised_choice_title: The Hags cannot be stopped. You may as well offer them something now, rather than have it taken from you later.

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: No, your men are your men. They remain so, unwavering and unsacrificed!

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details.localised_choice_title: No, your men are your men. They remain so, unwavering and unsacrificed!

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: Very good, very good. Now go away!

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details.localised_choice_title: Very good, very good. Now go away!

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: It seems this Lord already has enough fat on their bones! Clearly an audit is needed - let's see what else can be taxed…

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: There can be no mercy killings in your court! Drag the assassin to the fiery pits! Have the hags bind his soul in an artefact of power, so it can be tormented for all eternity!

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: You have no time for such trivial issues!

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: Your wrath will be as merciless as it is bloody! Summon the troops and the populace to the central square. They shall have a spectacle they will not soon forget!

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: These so called traitors just happen to be this Lord's rivals. Punish them all! Execute the traitors and brand the Lord with the mark of pain! Have their possessions confiscated at once!

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: What's the point of having a trial if there's no punishment to be meted out? Have the accused dragged to the torture chamber at once and stripped of any 'valuable possessions'!

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: Politics are boring and this farce of a trial isn't even remotely amusing. This case is dismissed, let's have a feast instead!

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: They are all guilty of wasting your time, so all of them shall face your wrath! Unless each pays their weight paid in gold… before the sun sets!

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: The most important rule is of course, that you are the law. If they want to win a case, they should try harder to entertain next time!

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: She is most beautiful, but the Phoenix King does not wish for complications right now.

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: What they whisper, he will know; this one works for the Phoenix King now.

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: "You played the game, and you got caught; too bad. Goodbye."

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: Weddings are boring. The Phoenix King has no intention of attending.

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: When a large gift is presented, the receiver can be sure of their worth. Such an award, though costly, will make the Phoenix King a hero in this couple’s eyes.

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: Some gifts symbolise the relationship between giver and receiver; even a small gesture would surely ingratiate the king to the couple.

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details.localised_choice_title: Some gifts symbolise the relationship between giver and receiver; even a small gesture would surely ingratiate the king to the couple.

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: Every Elven death is a tragedy. The Phoenix King feels compelled to say something.

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: The regal presence alone is a comfort in dark times.

localised_choice_label.last_approved_text: Insist that Chrace and Ellyrion dance together

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: Promote unity by having the two rivals dance together.

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details.localised_choice_title: Promote unity by having the two rivals dance together.

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: It is as though the Old Ones themselves speed your troops to ever-greater victories over the foe… until they fall, and become abominations unworthy of their sacred legacy and the Great Plan.

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details.localised_choice_title: It is as though the Old Ones themselves speed your troops to ever-greater victories over the foe… until they fall, and become abominations unworthy of their sacred legacy and the Great Plan.

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: You will not sanction such measures, given what they may produce. Such things risk all the work that has gone into the Great Plan - it must not be allowed to fail.

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details.localised_choice_title: You will not sanction such measures, given what they may produce. Such things risk all the work that has gone into the Great Plan - it must not be allowed to fail.

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: Truly this material is a gift from the Old Ones - a bounty that will wipe the enemies of the Great Plan from this world! If only it had not been warped in the aeons since…

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details.localised_choice_title: Truly this material is a gift from the Old Ones - a bounty that will wipe the enemies of the Great Plan from this world! If only it had not been warped in the aeons since…

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: Whatever wonders this ore might have achieved once, now it is too tainted to be of use. Discard it in favour of more traditional materials.

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details.localised_choice_title: Whatever wonders this ore might have achieved once, now it is too tainted to be of use. Discard it in favour of more traditional materials.

localised_choice_label.last_approved_text: Use the wisdom of the Old Ones

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details.localised_choice_label: Use the wisdom of the Old Ones

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: Such noble structures will stand while lesser buildings fall! Their swift construction will better serve the Old Ones' Great Plan for the world.

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details.localised_choice_title: Such noble structures will stand while lesser buildings fall! Their swift construction will better serve the Old Ones' Great Plan for the world.

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: When the foe - those who stand in the way of the Great Plan - are vanquished, then the former glories of the Old Ones will be restored.

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details.localised_choice_title: When the foe - those who stand in the way of the Great Plan - are vanquished, then the former glories of the Old Ones will be restored.

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: You attack unexpectedly, capture the required prisoners, and rip out their hearts. The magical currents surge; the Slann Mage-Priests smile; the Great Plan advances.

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details.localised_choice_title: You attack unexpectedly, capture the required prisoners, and rip out their hearts. The magical currents surge; the Slann Mage-Priests smile; the Great Plan advances.

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: You may need allies soon, and your differences may be resolved with discussion. If this is part of the Great Plan it must be allowed to play out naturally.

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details.localised_choice_title: You may need allies soon, and your differences may be resolved with discussion. If this is part of the Great Plan it must be allowed to play out naturally.

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: Your fearsome warriors lay into the enemy with gusto, even when it leaves them open to attack! Even losses are part of the Great Plan and further spawnings are always possible.

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details.localised_choice_title: Your fearsome warriors lay into the enemy with gusto, even when it leaves them open to attack! Even losses are part of the Great Plan and further spawnings are always possible.

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: Courage must be tempered with caution or losses will ensue. After all, you never know when the Vermintide will rise or the Ancient Enemy burst forth from the Realm of Chaos once more.

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details.localised_choice_title: Courage must be tempered with caution or losses will ensue. After all, you never know when the Vermintide will rise or the Ancient Enemy burst forth from the Realm of Chaos once more.

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: Your Saurus warriors fight with bravery that fills you with hope, yet they also fall in great numbers before the foe.

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details.localised_choice_title: Your Saurus warriors fight with bravery that fills you with hope, yet they also fall in great numbers before the foe.

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: Dead warriors are of no use to the Great Plan. Cautious warriors live to fight on, that the foe may be swept from the world in realisation of the Old Ones' sacred designs.

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details.localised_choice_title: Dead warriors are of no use to the Great Plan. Cautious warriors live to fight on, that the foe may be swept from the world in realisation of the Old Ones' sacred designs.

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: Such research uses valuable resources - resources that could otherwise be committed to the Great Plan - but strengthens the Geomantic Web. A trade-off, then…

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details.localised_choice_title: Such research uses valuable resources - resources that could otherwise be committed to the Great Plan - but strengthens the Geomantic Web. A trade-off, then…

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: The Great Plan must always consider the bigger picture, even where magic is concerned, lest the foe acquires the bleeding edge and steals the march…

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details.localised_choice_title: The Great Plan must always consider the bigger picture, even where magic is concerned, lest the foe acquires the bleeding edge and steals the march…

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: This advantage must be taken, even when it draws power from the world. The Great Plan is robust enough to survive a minor deviation such as this.

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details.localised_choice_title: This advantage must be taken, even when it draws power from the world. The Great Plan is robust enough to survive a minor deviation such as this.

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: Now is not the time to risk weakening the Geomantic Web - the world is at the edge of a precipice and every ounce of power is needed!

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details.localised_choice_title: Now is not the time to risk weakening the Geomantic Web - the world is at the edge of a precipice and every ounce of power is needed!

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: A strong army is essential to the Great Plan; your ranks swell with cold-blooded Saurus warriors, devoid of pity and mercy.

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details.localised_choice_title: A strong army is essential to the Great Plan; your ranks swell with cold-blooded Saurus warriors, devoid of pity and mercy.

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: A Hero is worth a hundred ordinary warriors; you must choose Saurus or Skink and open battle versus the clandestine war of subtlety and surprise.

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details.localised_choice_title: A Hero is worth a hundred ordinary warriors; you must choose Saurus or Skink and open battle versus the clandestine war of subtlety and surprise.

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: The plaque is easily recovered, and the ritual successful; your Saurus Scar-Veteran will turn the blades of your enemies with even greater ease!

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details.localised_choice_title: The plaque is easily recovered, and the ritual successful; your Saurus Scar-Veteran will turn the blades of your enemies with even greater ease!

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: Perhaps later - in this occasion the Plan can wait. For now, you must ensure the strength of your temple-cities against Chaos' foul corruption.

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details.localised_choice_title: Perhaps later - in this occasion the Plan can wait. For now, you must ensure the strength of your temple-cities against Chaos' foul corruption.

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: The weak, pandering Northmen are easy prey, and you recover what they have plundered with ease, expelling the tainted barbarians from Lustrian shores and back into the sea.

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details.localised_choice_title: The weak, pandering Northmen are easy prey, and you recover what they have plundered with ease, expelling the tainted barbarians from Lustrian shores and back into the sea.

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: The threat from the Norsca will have to be met later. For now, you have recovered a valuable artefact. The Plan is the Plan after all, and deviation from its course cannot be countenanced!

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details.localised_choice_title: The threat from the Norsca will have to be met later. For now, you have recovered a valuable artefact. The Plan is the Plan after all, and deviation from its course cannot be countenanced!

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: You are taking territory thought lost for many ages, and losing fewer Skinks essential to the Old Ones' Great Plan. Onwards!

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details.localised_choice_title: You are taking territory thought lost for many ages, and losing fewer Skinks essential to the Old Ones' Great Plan. Onwards!

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: Whilst recolonisation is part of the Great Plan, for now you need your warriors close at hand to defend against threats both overt and clandestine.

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details.localised_choice_title: Whilst recolonisation is part of the Great Plan, for now you need your warriors close at hand to defend against threats both overt and clandestine.

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: The affiliates of the Ruinous Ones can no longer reach you, but you lose access to any artefacts or other items of use that may have served the Great Plan.

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details.localised_choice_title: The affiliates of the Ruinous Ones can no longer reach you, but you lose access to any artefacts or other items of use that may have served the Great Plan.

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: The Druchii did not expect their byways to be used against them; they retreat to their dark, barren homeland. However, Chaos' foul taint remains and must be scourged from the face of Lustria!

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details.localised_choice_title: The Druchii did not expect their byways to be used against them; they retreat to their dark, barren homeland. However, Chaos' foul taint remains and must be scourged from the face of Lustria!

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: Like any cancer, Chaos' foul corruption must be cut out before it can spread. Replenish your forces later - a brand new spawning for the furtherance of the Great Plan!

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details.localised_choice_title: Like any cancer, Chaos' foul corruption must be cut out before it can spread. Replenish your forces later - a brand new spawning for the furtherance of the Great Plan!

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: More Saurus warriors are required to defeat the Ancient Enemy's foul taint. It is a shame they were not spawned earlier, for Chaos' foul corruption now blights your lands and must be forced back!

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details.localised_choice_title: More Saurus warriors are required to defeat the Ancient Enemy's foul taint. It is a shame they were not spawned earlier, for Chaos' foul corruption now blights your lands and must be forced back!

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: Many Skinks are lost, but the pestilence is contained. The Great Plan has not been overturned and the foe's designs are thwarted this day.

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details.localised_choice_title: Many Skinks are lost, but the pestilence is contained. The Great Plan has not been overturned and the foe's designs are thwarted this day.

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: Skinks with skills of great use are saved, but the foulness spreads - Pestilens' takes a giant skitterleap toward victory and the Great Plan suffers a setback as a result.

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: Warriors, not workers, issue forth, ready to battle the forces of corruption! The Great Plan will take time to come to fruition, but they who threaten its progress are here now!

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details.localised_choice_title: Warriors, not workers, issue forth, ready to battle the forces of corruption! The Great Plan will take time to come to fruition, but they who threaten its progress are here now!

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: The spawnings follow the Great Plan. All things happen for a reason and the Skinks have their part to play: society must not grind to a halt!

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: Your efforts pay off, although focusing your resources thus takes it from your grand Saurus armies and risks their strength against the insidious foe.

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: Your army grows in accordance with Sotek's wishes, but the benefits to the Great Plan that will surely be gleaned from these advances must wait.

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: A Skink Chief will improve income, replenish the warriors in your armies, attack enemy walls and assassinate their Lords and Heroes.

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: Reason overcomes vengeance. Even Queek sees that he must continue to serve the interests of Clan Mors first and foremost.

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: No-no! Clan Mors can wait, Queek’s personal honour is far more important.

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details.localised_choice_title: No-no! Clan Mors can wait, Queek’s personal honour is far more important.

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: Harnessing the Gorebull’s destructive nature is the obvious choice. The great, weird moon - Morrslieb - hangs low; we are incensed!

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details.localised_choice_title: Harnessing the Gorebull’s destructive nature is the obvious choice. The great, weird moon - Morrslieb - hangs low; we are incensed!

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: What do the Chaos Gods whisper? What dark machinations do they plot? The Bray-Shaman will surely reveal these secrets to us...

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details.localised_choice_title: What do the Chaos Gods whisper? What dark machinations do they plot? The Bray-Shaman will surely reveal these secrets to us...

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: Take what you can from them to sustain us and let us be gone!

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details.localised_choice_title: Take what you can from them to sustain us and let us be gone!

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: Their temples and pitiful gods lay before us, ripe for desecration. Let us leave our mark and be on our way.

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details.localised_choice_title: Their temples and pitiful gods lay before us, ripe for desecration. Let us leave our mark and be on our way.

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: The proud and ignorant Empire are a bigger prize. Their flesh will taste all the better for the challenge!

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details.localised_choice_title: The proud and ignorant Empire are a bigger prize. Their flesh will taste all the better for the challenge!

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: Bretonnians are arrogant and foolish people, haughty and easily exploited. Let us take them apart.

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details.localised_choice_title: Bretonnians are arrogant and foolish people, haughty and easily exploited. Let us take them apart.

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: Middenheimers are a tougher challenge, but their flesh will taste all the better for the fight to claim it!

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details.localised_choice_title: Middenheimers are a tougher challenge, but their flesh will taste all the better for the fight to claim it!

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: The Hochlanders are vulnerable, beset on all sides. To strike now would be almost easy... and certainly delicious!

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details.localised_choice_title: The Hochlanders are vulnerable, beset on all sides. To strike now would be almost easy... and certainly delicious!

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: Todbringer is a worthy foe. His strength, and the taste of man-flesh, will be Khazrak's!

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details.localised_choice_title: Todbringer is a worthy foe. His strength, and the taste of man-flesh, will be Khazrak's!

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: Those who see the shrivelled eye around Khazrak's neck know his power and tremble.

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details.localised_choice_title: Those who see the shrivelled eye around Khazrak's neck know his power and tremble.

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: The whelp has learned his place. Removing his horns ensures he can never again challenge you. A good decision, and punishment enough - he can re-join the herd.

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details.localised_choice_title: The whelp has learned his place. Removing his horns ensures he can never again challenge you. A good decision, and punishment enough - he can re-join the herd.

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: Insubordination is unacceptable. The entire herd must know of your unswerving will - that you and you alone are Lord of them all! Put him to death!

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details.localised_choice_title: Insubordination is unacceptable. The entire herd must know of your unswerving will - that you and you alone are Lord of them all! Put him to death!

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: What is madness but a gift from the Gods? Some will fall to the creature's maddening influence, but the rest of the herd will be greatly improved by the abomination's presence.

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details.localised_choice_title: What is madness but a gift from the Gods? Some will fall to the creature's maddening influence, but the rest of the herd will be greatly improved by the abomination's presence.

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: We do not need this bizarre curio to win the day. Our enemies are Uncloven fools and will be rended by our power alone!

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details.localised_choice_title: We do not need this bizarre curio to win the day. Our enemies are Uncloven fools and will be rended by our power alone!

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: What dark favour is brought forth by our dedication to destruction and ruin? We will receive it in payment!

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details.localised_choice_title: What dark favour is brought forth by our dedication to destruction and ruin? We will receive it in payment!

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: Your refusal of our master's Ruinous generosity has signalled your strength to others, who now flock to your warherd, desperate to fight under such a powerful Beastlord.

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details.localised_choice_title: Your refusal of our master's Ruinous generosity has signalled your strength to others, who now flock to your warherd, desperate to fight under such a powerful Beastlord.

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: They could not be stopped now even if you wanted it. Revelry is in their blood - let them feast! Let them be raucous! They will be grateful for it.

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details.localised_choice_title: They could not be stopped now even if you wanted it. Revelry is in their blood - let them feast! Let them be raucous! They will be grateful for it.

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: No matter what their blood calls for, the herdstone must be worshipped! The Ruinous rites must be obeyed!

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details.localised_choice_title: No matter what their blood calls for, the herdstone must be worshipped! The Ruinous rites must be obeyed!

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: The great herdstone at the Heart of the Dark calls out. Who are we to stop the pull of that foul and powerful monolith?

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details.localised_choice_title: The great herdstone at the Heart of the Dark calls out. Who are we to stop the pull of that foul and powerful monolith?

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: Although denied his opportunity, the Shaman resolves to remain and draw the Greater Winds of Magic across the blood-ground!

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details.localised_choice_title: Although denied his opportunity, the Shaman resolves to remain and draw the Greater Winds of Magic across the blood-ground!

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: The Gods must be appeased and their Ruinous gifts bestowed upon us once more. Kill the warriors! Accept the price! Blood for the Blood God!

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details.localised_choice_title: The Gods must be appeased and their Ruinous gifts bestowed upon us once more. Kill the warriors! Accept the price! Blood for the Blood God!

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: The herd is yours and nobody - not even the Gods - can wrest it from your control.

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details.localised_choice_title: The herd is yours and nobody - not even the Gods - can wrest it from your control.

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: The call cannot be ignored! Though answering it may thin our numbers, those that survive will fight stronger for it. There only the roar of battle - the call of blood!

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details.localised_choice_title: The call cannot be ignored! Though answering it may thin our numbers, those that survive will fight stronger for it. There only the roar of battle - the call of blood!

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: We need no brayherd to make our way in the world, we can create destruction and discord very well on our own!

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details.localised_choice_title: We need no brayherd to make our way in the world, we can create destruction and discord very well on our own!

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: They can worship the Chaos Gods if they like, but there is only ruin to be found in such a foolish course of action!

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details.localised_choice_title: They can worship the Chaos Gods if they like, but there is only ruin to be found in such a foolish course of action!

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: They are not the children of Chaos. The Uncloven Ones must pay the price for their ignorance! Human blood must ALWAYS be spilled.

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details.localised_choice_title: The herd is incensed and ready for war! Providing, that is, that war comes to them…

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: Vampires respond best to a show of brutal force. Vlad's rage was legendary back in the day, remind these fools why - let the bloodletting begin!

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details.localised_choice_title: Vampires respond best to a show of brutal force. Vlad's rage was legendary back in the day, remind these fools why - let the bloodletting begin!

localised_choice_label.last_approved_text: Let me show you true power!

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details.localised_choice_label: Let me show you true power!

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: Vlad is a charismatic creature of low cunning when he can best his temper. This was how he first seduced the nobility of Sylvania. A promise to share wealth and power should lure them to his side.

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details.localised_choice_title: Vlad is a charismatic creature of low cunning when he can best his temper. This was how he first seduced the nobility of Sylvania. A promise to share wealth and power should lure them to his side.

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: Our kin have travelled far with gladness in their heart, a gladness we share fully - grant them their audience, let them treat with us as family.

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details.localised_choice_title: Our kin have travelled far with gladness in their heart, a gladness we share fully - grant them their audience, let them treat with us as family.

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: The arrogance! After so long, and so much silence, they deem us worthy to talk with them? No! Send them back across the waves; we care not!

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details.localised_choice_title: The arrogance! After so long, and so much silence, they deem us worthy to talk with them? No! Send them back across the waves; we care not!

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: Cast them out. These Dryads have done us a great wrong but to destroy them would be to anger the forest. Send them away; far away!

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details.localised_choice_title: Cast them out. These Dryads have done us a great wrong but to destroy them would be to anger the forest. Send them away; far away!

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: This slight against the Asrai cannot go unpunished. Introduce them to their mortal foe; turn them into kindling for the great pyre!

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details.localised_choice_title: This slight against the Asrai cannot go unpunished. Introduce them to their mortal foe; turn them into kindling for the great pyre!

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: There is no hope that this impetuous knave can hope to best a Wardancer, but it would be an amusement to see him try. Take the wager!

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details.localised_choice_title: There is no hope that this impetuous knave can hope to best a Wardancer, but it would be an amusement to see him try. Take the wager!

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: This insolence adds another heinous crime to the list. You will suffer it no more. Kill him immediately!

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details.localised_choice_title: This insolence adds another heinous crime to the list. You will suffer it no more. Kill him immediately!

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: In these troubled times, the wisdom of Asuryan flies as true as any Elven arrow.

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details.localised_choice_title: In these troubled times, the wisdom of Asuryan flies as true as any Elven arrow.

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: We are in a dark and bitter age; the battle-hardened fury of Khaine would surely be a boon to our efforts.

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details.localised_choice_title: We are in a dark and bitter age; the battle-hardened fury of Khaine would surely be a boon to our efforts.

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: This scheme, although shameless, can only help to undermine the haughty Bretonnians who encroach on the forest. Aid them we shall!

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details.localised_choice_title: This scheme, although shameless, can only help to undermine the haughty Bretonnians who encroach on the forest. Aid them we shall!

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: Such underhanded plans are not fit for the nobility of the Elven High Houses. Tell Cavaroc they must do this without our blessing!

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details.localised_choice_title: Such underhanded plans are not fit for the nobility of the Elven High Houses. Tell Cavaroc they must do this without our blessing!

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: Though the Dreaming Wood is steeped in treachery, this Glade Lord's intentions are noble. Who are we to stop them?

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details.localised_choice_title: Though the Dreaming Wood is steeped in treachery, this Glade Lord's intentions are noble. Who are we to stop them?

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: No. The Dreaming Wood is forbidden for a reason. Slaanesh cannot claim another Asrai soul. Not this day!

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details.localised_choice_title: No. The Dreaming Wood is forbidden for a reason. Slaanesh cannot claim another Asrai soul. Not this day!

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: This was a warrior, who deserves a warrior's send-off. Light the pyres, prepare the bier, and let us do this one justice!

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details.localised_choice_title: This was a warrior, who deserves a warrior's send-off. Light the pyres, prepare the bier, and let us do this one justice!

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: As we are all born from the forest, so we return to the forest. Dig the hole deep; let the forest reclaim its child…

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details.localised_choice_title: As we are all born from the forest, so we return to the forest. Dig the hole deep; let the forest reclaim its child…

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: The Hunt makes fair targets of us all; the Great Stag will make a dazzling addition to any hunter's trophy collection.

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details.localised_choice_title: The Hunt makes fair targets of us all; the Great Stag will make a dazzling addition to any hunter's trophy collection.

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: The soul of the forest is sacred; the beast should not be harmed, representing as it does the spirit of Athel Loren.

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details.localised_choice_title: The soul of the forest is sacred; the beast should not be harmed, representing as it does the spirit of Athel Loren.

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: What dark and twisted deeds they may be weaving throughout the Night Glens is their business, and the repercussions theirs to deal with. You will have no part of it…

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details.localised_choice_title: What dark and twisted deeds they may be weaving throughout the Night Glens is their business, and the repercussions theirs to deal with. You will have no part of it…

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: Though these spells are not strictly… permitted, what may be advantage to the Asrai should surely be harnessed?

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details.localised_choice_title: Though these spells are not strictly… permitted, what may be advantage to the Asrai should surely be harnessed?

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: The fatter they become, the greater the eventual sacrifice. Have patience and it shall be rewarded in the end.

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details.localised_choice_title: The fatter they become, the greater the eventual sacrifice. Have patience and it shall be rewarded in the end.

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: The guests have enjoyed our hospitality for long enough. It is time they repaid our kindness with the ultimate generosity. Prepare them!

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details.localised_choice_title: The guests have enjoyed our hospitality for long enough. It is time they repaid our kindness with the ultimate generosity. Prepare them!

localised_choice_label.last_approved_text: Give them to merchants and craftsmen

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details.localised_choice_label: Give them to merchants and craftsmen

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: The merchants and craftsmen of the city are hard workers and deserve this small token of gratitude!

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details.localised_choice_title: The merchants and craftsmen of the city are hard workers and deserve this small token of gratitude!

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: Will they stop their ceaseless complaining if we feed them this once? I suppose we can find out.

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details.localised_choice_title: Will they stop their ceaseless complaining if we feed them this once? I suppose we can find out.

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: The wealth of our blacksmiths and armourers is theirs - let them be the most resplendent in all the world!

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details.localised_choice_title: The wealth of our blacksmiths and armourers is theirs - let them be the most resplendent in all the world!

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: Let us feast to give thanks! Increase the levy on the peasants; we shall have what we need!

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details.localised_choice_title: Let us feast to give thanks! Increase the levy on the peasants; we shall have what we need!

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: The time has come to wipe these demons and blighted scourges from our lands. To the wastes – bring war to Chaos!

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details.localised_choice_title: The time has come to wipe these demons and blighted scourges from our lands. To the wastes – bring war to Chaos!

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: These filthy, loathsome masses have endured too long. Now we shall end them forever – March on the Badlands with haste!

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details.localised_choice_title: These filthy, loathsome masses have endured too long. Now we shall end them forever – March on the Badlands with haste!

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: Treason is treason - have him hanged like a common criminal. His entire family can die with him too.

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details.localised_choice_title: Treason is treason - have him hanged like a common criminal. His entire family can die with him too.

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: There is no need to be savage - simply cripple the man, and take the grain back.

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details.localised_choice_title: There is no need to be savage - simply cripple the man, and take the grain back.

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: The Fay Enchantress and her Damsels will be able to offer the best advice to the children; request their aid.

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details.localised_choice_title: The Fay Enchantress and her Damsels will be able to offer the best advice to the children; request their aid.

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: There are means at our immediate disposal to aid their training - let us help these children.

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details.localised_choice_title: There are means at our immediate disposal to aid their training - let us help these children.

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: Placing this idol at the centre of our city would inspire great faith in the people!

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details.localised_choice_title: Placing this idol at the centre of our city would inspire great faith in the people!

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: The statue is important to the locals. Who are we to interfere with the realm's stability?

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details.localised_choice_title: The statue is important to the locals. Who are we to interfere with the realm's stability?

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: The nobles can hunt wherever they wish; it is, after all, their land…

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details.localised_choice_title: The nobles can hunt wherever they wish; it is, after all, their land…

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: There are much better areas to hunt than this squalid furrow.

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details.localised_choice_title: There are much better areas to hunt than this squalid furrow.

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: The Lady will forever have a friend in us; make the donation.

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: Get the peasants to donate to their cause.

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details.localised_choice_title: Get the peasants to donate to their cause.

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: No. These words may inspire others to worse disrespect - fashion a strongly-worded reply!

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details.localised_choice_title: No. These words may inspire others to worse disrespect - fashion a strongly-worded reply!

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: Idle banter is none of our concern - let these chickens cluck!

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details.localised_choice_title: Idle banter is none of our concern - let these chickens cluck!

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: Close the Gates! Quarantine the infected! We need to keep this out!

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details.localised_choice_title: Close the Gates! Quarantine the infected! We need to keep this out!

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: There is no pox; our apothecaries saw to that. Do not panic.

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details.localised_choice_title: There is no pox; our apothecaries saw to that. Do not panic.

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: Danger comes at all times; the future is now, let us grow strong from our achievements.

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details.localised_choice_title: Danger comes at all times; the future is now, let us grow strong from our achievements.

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: The future is unforeseeable; let us store this surplus, for one day we may need it more.

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details.localised_choice_title: The future is unforeseeable; let us store this surplus, for one day we may need it more.

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: Alberic has no time to waste. If the man's information holds true, then seeing honour and justice restored to the realm will be more than worth the price. Pay him.

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details.localised_choice_title: Alberic has no time to waste. If the man's information holds true, then seeing honour and justice restored to the realm will be more than worth the price. Pay him.

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: Extortion! He may be desperate, but Alberic is no shill and will not be humiliated by this lowlife. Have the information drawn from him, by force!

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details.localised_choice_title: Extortion! He may be desperate, but Alberic is no shill and will not be humiliated by this lowlife. Have the information drawn from him, by force!

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: Let the Lady see that we are nurturing her land.

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details.localised_choice_title: Let the Lady see that we are nurturing her land.

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: The blessing was first received by the destruction of our enemies - let us prove ourselves in battle again!

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details.localised_choice_title: The blessing was first received by the destruction of our enemies - let us prove ourselves in battle again!

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: Magic cannot be left unchecked. Burn the entire village if you must; stop this aberration.

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details.localised_choice_title: Magic cannot be left unchecked. Burn the entire village if you must; stop this aberration.

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: Very superstitious! When you believe in things you don't understand, then you suffer!

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details.localised_choice_title: Very superstitious! When you believe in things you don't understand, then you suffer!

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: The promises of riches and power are beguiling and the cost is so little. This may well be a worthy investment and a chance to scry the hidden land of Albion.

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details.localised_choice_title: The promises of riches and power are beguiling and the cost is so little. This may well be a worthy investment and a chance to scry the hidden land of Albion.

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: Send this dark emissary on his way! There is nothing in Albion for us, let some other fool pay for this creature's shadow war.

localised_choice_label.last_approved_text: We'll see who is the fool!

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details.localised_choice_label: We'll see who is the fool!

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: Let us make an example of these rumour-mongers and malicious gossips. A punishment is called for.

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details.localised_choice_title: Let us make an example of these rumour-mongers and malicious gossips. A punishment is called for.

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: While you cannot be dictated to by rumours and whispers, less time boasting and more spent planning future victories might be wiser.

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details.localised_choice_title: While you cannot be dictated to by rumours and whispers, less time boasting and more spent planning future victories might be wiser.

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: There will be a large tribute, the day marked with a great feast or sacrifice.

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details.localised_choice_title: There will be a large tribute, the day marked with a great feast or sacrifice.

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: Let them stew! They should be patient, for your realm will endure and grow and they will reap the benefit.

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details.localised_choice_title: Let them stew! They should be patient, for your realm will endure and grow and they will reap the benefit.

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: There is no room for refugees here. Turn them back and let the gods decide their fate.

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details.localised_choice_title: There is no room for refugees here. Turn them back and let the gods decide their fate.

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: There are always wars to fight, so more bodies could be useful. Welcome them with a smile, they will pay for this hospitality at a later time.

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details.localised_choice_title: There are always wars to fight, so more bodies could be useful. Welcome them with a smile, they will pay for this hospitality at a later time.

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: An offering to our gods and to the warriors' own purses should improve matters and help them find their boldness.

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details.localised_choice_title: An offering to our gods and to the warriors' own purses should improve matters and help them find their boldness.

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: The dark moon can be seen by anybody looking to the night sky. Who says it is an omen aimed solely at them?

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details.localised_choice_title: The dark moon can be seen by anybody looking to the night sky. Who says it is an omen aimed solely at them?

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: Summon an Orc Shaman for questioning...

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details.localised_choice_title: Summon a Night Goblin Shaman for questioning...

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: A punitive levy on our wine could hurt the vintners and our economy. We must side with the factors and settle this with chivalrous steel if necessary.

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details.localised_choice_title: A punitive levy on our wine could hurt the vintners and our economy. We must side with the factors and settle this with chivalrous steel if necessary.

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: The levy is high, but they will be deprived of fine wine if we stop selling to them (and be left with that Wissenland swill!), so there remains room to negotiate.

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details.localised_choice_title: The levy is high, but they will be deprived of fine wine if we stop selling to them (and be left with that Wissenland swill!), so there remains room to negotiate.

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: The man is a thief, but he remains loyal to us. We should not risk replacing him for another whose allegiance is not as assured.

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details.localised_choice_title: The man is a thief, but he remains loyal to us. We should not risk replacing him for another whose allegiance is not as assured.

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: We have no room for the corrupt in our domain. Kick him from his castle so a more worthy candidate can take his place.

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details.localised_choice_title: We have no room for the corrupt in our domain. Kick him from his castle so a more worthy candidate can take his place.

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: Let us slay a few boars, erect the dancing pole and let the smallfolk feast for the day. Full stomachs should quash this petty rebellion.

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details.localised_choice_title: Let us slay a few boars, erect the dancing pole and let the smallfolk feast for the day. Full stomachs should quash this petty rebellion.

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: The taxes stand, and extra levies will be placed on them to cover the damage these fools have caused. Send in the Knights of the Realm to enforce this edict.

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: Let the Gods look elsewhere. Their gaze will return in time and then they will see all your good works.

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details.localised_choice_title: Let the Gods look elsewhere. Their gaze will return in time and then they will see all your good works.

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: A grand slaughter or some other vainglorious gesture is needed to get the Eye of the Gods to flicker open.
