localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: Kill! Maim! Burn!

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details.localised_choice_title: Kill! Maim! Burn!

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: Let us relent on the fighting, and let the insurrection begin from within.

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: Let Nurgle come and visit his festerlings and buboes on those lucky folk in the south.

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: There is nothing more important than avenging every grudge. Are we not Dawi? The debt must be settled in blood and damn the cost!

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details.localised_choice_title: There is nothing more important than avenging every grudge. Are we not Dawi? The debt must be settled in blood and damn the cost!

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: Foolish Dwarf! Of course the grudge must be settled no matter the cost! Now, bring the foe to account and we'll have no more 'wobbles' from you!

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details.localised_choice_title: Foolish Dwarf! Of course the grudge must be settled no matter the cost! Now, bring the foe to account and we'll have no more 'wobbles' from you!

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: We cannot overlook a loss of honour, as an ally it reflects on us too. He must take the oath and seek his doom. We will have to take the loss of influence.

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: The Elector Counts and the lesser nobles have more than enough, a new reign calls for a new approach. Take it from them and distribute it among more deserving subjects.

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: This is an ugly part of war, but a reality nonetheless. Our many enemies do not treat the people any better.

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: They must pay, as does every other man and woman in the Empire. In the meantime the Witch Hunters will seek out the rabble-rousers and silence them!

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: So they stamp and scream like little children? Then they must live with the consequences of demanding a Vampire Count's attention…

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details.localised_choice_title: So they stamp and scream like little children? Then they must live with the consequences of demanding a Vampire Count's attention…

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: Their time will come, but for now the prize lies at the heart of the Old World, not on its periphery.

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details.localised_choice_title: Their time will come, but for now the prize lies at the heart of the Old World, not on its periphery.

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: There is great power in this nameless creature, we will not confront it… yet.

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details.localised_choice_title: There is great power in this nameless creature, we will not confront it… yet.

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: No thing, living or dead, should dare challenge us!

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details.localised_choice_title: No thing, living or dead, should dare challenge us!

localised_choice_label.last_approved_text: A worthy gift, and I have a thirst!

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details.localised_choice_label: A worthy gift, and I have a thirst!

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: Grombrindal thinks the wait worth it to taste one of Bugman's legendary brews. Its fortifying effects will boost the White Dwarf's already considerable might. So what if there are more enemies to fight? They will all die with ease.

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details.localised_choice_title: Grombrindal thinks the wait worth it to taste one of Bugman's legendary brews. Its fortifying effects will boost the White Dwarf's already considerable might. So what if there are more enemies to fight? They will all die with ease.

localised_choice_label.last_approved_text: Save it for our victory feast!

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details.localised_choice_label: Save it for our victory feast!

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: As tempting as one of Bugman's concoctions is, Grombrindal wishes to be away, for there are scores to settle and Beastmen to kill!

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details.localised_choice_title: As tempting as one of Bugman's concoctions is, Grombrindal wishes to be away, for there are scores to settle and Beastmen to kill!

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: One legend speaks of a drinking match between Grimnir and Grombrindal. If one drunk the other under the table it was never disclosed, although all variations of the story agree that the beer stores from miles around ran dry and a strong warrior bond was formed between the two.

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details.localised_choice_title: One legend speaks of a drinking match between Grimnir and Grombrindal. If one drunk the other under the table it was never disclosed, although all variations of the story agree that the beer stores from miles around ran dry and a strong warrior bond was formed between the two.

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: Who is the White Dwarf? A king called Snorri? A lost god? A wanderer? All of this and more? One thing is certain, when he puts his mind to something - when he deems a grudge worthy of striking from his pages - then no hell hath the fury to match the White Dwarf!

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details.localised_choice_title: Who is the White Dwarf? A king called Snorri? A lost god? A wanderer? All of this and more? One thing is certain, when he puts his mind to something - when he deems a grudge worthy of striking from his pages - then no hell hath the fury to match the White Dwarf!

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: There are songs sung of the love between Grombrindal and Valaya. Such chorales are not performed within presence of the White Dwarf, for that would be unseemly. After all, Valaya was the wife of Grungni... Whatever the truth, the sagas do not doubt that the White Dwarf held a special place in her heart, so her protection, when called upon, is assured.

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details.localised_choice_title: There are songs sung of the love between Grombrindal and Valaya. Such chorales are not performed within presence of the White Dwarf, for that would be unseemly. After all, Valaya was the wife of Grungni... Whatever the truth, the sagas do not doubt that the White Dwarf held a special place in her heart, so her protection, when called upon, is assured.

localised_choice_title.last_approved_text: Grungni was the first Dwarf to delve into rock, and so his wisdom is vast, his eye for gold and minerals unrivalled. The White Dwarf can call upon his judgement and - should Grungni be in a generous mood - receive the teachings of a god.
